course_title: Portraits of Jesus:  Art and the Interpretation of the Gospels
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 10 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 0 of 6
class_notes: You may enroll in this class either as REL 247W or IDS 201W.
course_description: An exploration of the New Testament gospels as literary works of art in the first-century contexts and how passages from those gospels have been dynamically (re)interpreted through the visual arts.
sections: Class Nbr: 4364, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: D. Gowler, Status: Wait List
